-e ---

Egyptian Determinants are similar to Sumerian determinatives

There exist two types of classes in the classification system of Ancient Egyptian that are not found in Sumerian: one classifying events generally realized as verbs, and a few very general and inclusive “abstract” classes.

Like in the revised view about the Egyptian equivalents, most if not all signs had a phonetic value ( optionally spoken), as evidenced by
𒎎 NA natron 𒉌𒌓𒈾 NA.UT natrium nautic (salt => all kinds of natural stones)

  1. 𒐀 DIDLI dual Tüttel 1 Haus =>2 Häuser quelques some few ≠ total
  2. 𒋢 KUŠ skin ŠU 𒆳𒊭𒀸 kur-sa-as skins …
  3. 𒀭 Dingir Dei… 𓏏𓆇 Thei… Gods…
  4. 𒌷 URU Ort<orbit< 𓊨 Kurbeith 𓊖 city
  5. 𒌚 itu(d) zeit,tit,day,iteration ⇔ 𒌓 UD month
  6. 𒄷 HU,MUŠEN Huhn,Meisen,🎶… winged birds/beetles...
  7. 𒄀 GI4 segge 𓇓 𓇔 reeds
  8. 𒃰 GADA (flax/linen cut) coat 𓋮𓋳 garment
  9. 𒊓 SA Sack ∑ schar 4 some…
  10. 𒃷 aša/iku acker acre
  11. 𒊕 SAG slave… ∑ 1. Schopf 2. Sache!
  12. 𒀯/𒋼 MUL/TE multi 𓇼𓇽 zodiac,constellations…
  13. 𒍏 URUD 𒍐 red-copper-rod
  14. 𒍜 •VZU(sic) flesh
  15. 𒀲 ANŠE onager > ansel Esel ass
  16. 𒁉 KAŠ BI/DI (Kasten/Gersten) beer
  17. 𒋆 SHIM / šim : smell, scent, aroma
  18. 𒎎 NA(Tᶥᵐ) natron 𓊹𓂋𓏏𓈒𓏥 salts… 𒌓𒉌 zT+NI 𒉭 Steine
  19. 𒄑 GIŠ cis < cypress 𓈙!? gEsche 𓆱𓆭 עץ
  20. 𒄞 GUD cow<cattle ox⇔ 𒂁 DUG ⇔ 𒋫 taur
  21. 𒋫𒀀𒀭 ta-àm autam (each self)
  22. 𒂁 DUG jug
  23. 𒌑 4Ú food
  24. 𒂍 hÉ 𓉔 Heim(home) 󴉅 Hain היכל هيكل haykal hall
  25. 𒇽 LU legitime leute 𓂋𓐍𓏏𓅚𓀀𓏥𓁐 लोग log 人 rechte
  26. 𒊬 ŚAR 𓆷 SA zart green agrar garden herbs shrubs 𓆰
  27. 𒆳 kur 𓈉 𓈊 ⋍ Шkара 𓇾 3
  28. 𒊺 ŠE shekel 𓇣 cereal 𓇡 corn 𓂋 seeds 𓇗𓌽
  29. 𒀯/𒋼 MUL/TE multi 𓇼𓇽 zodiac,constellations…
  30. 𒎁𒁇/𒆉𒁇 zabar≠silber 𒁇bar…za bronze bar (alwayse reverse) 𒌓/𒄞𒅗𒁇 ⇔ 𒍏𒍐 𓅙𓃀𓏏𓊌
  31. 𒄭𒀀 ḪI-a 𓎛𓈖𓂝 auch con
  32. 𒉎 TU Ton 土 ⇔ turn: wind
  33. 𒅎 IM mud, clay ⇔ mwater=rain
  34. 𒄰 KAM quam 𒆛 quantity
  35. 𒌌 UL VL flower
  36. 𒍼 GIG sick(ness) < 𒈪 kako (black) plague
  37. 𒆠 KI® kur country
  38. 𒁹 DIŠ dash, dies:1
  39. 𒈨𒌍 MES mehrzahl 𓄟 ⇔ menge 𓏪 𓏤𓏤𓏤 𓏼 𓏨
  40. 𒌆 TÚG Tuch textile ⇔ τόξε 𒆪 𓌕
  41. 𒆪 tukul tochar 𓍱𓋴𓂋𓌕 𓌖𓂚𓉻 τόξε weapon 𒆪 ⋍ Tuch 𒌆
  42. 𒇻 UDU goat/gut, LU lamm
  43. 𒍥 ZID 𓈙𓇋𓆓𓏏𓈓 cjésta це́ста dough ≠ seed 𒍣
  44. 𒋠 SÍG Zeug,silk…
  45. 𒊩 šal sie ix:Ische prefix MUNUS Minna feminine woman female
  46. 𒈫 MIN 门 門 menge 𒋰 nhị 二 -er -rain dual
  47. 𒀀𒀭 AM Ien sein ana I am/be
  48. 𒀀𒇉 •iter 𓇋𓏏𓂋𓈘 water
  49. 𒉒 ninda nān𓏏dough bread
  50. 𒄩 KU6 coy 𒄩 KUD cod 𓊠𓂝𓏏𓆛 fish suffix!
  51. 𒍑 -UŠ -ton male suffix vs 𒊩- prefix

𒋻 SILA calla street ⋍ 𒐀
𒉆 NAM- (abstract prefix) 𓅓 im- -ing -ment -ness

the akkadian loan gušūru is almost certainly derived from ǧeš-úr meaning something like “wooden base, basis” and demonstrates that in this case ǧeš- wood has the function of a pronounced(!) classifier, i.e. ‘wood’.
